title: Decline a Story Pitch
description: A reporter pitches a story, but the editor decides it is not a good fit for the publication and must decline it constructively.

tasks.expected_outcome: The editor fully understands the proposed story.

tasks.description: Formulate a clear reason for declining the pitch (e.g., 'it's too similar to a story we ran last month,' or 'we don't have the resources for this kind of investigation right now').
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear, valid reason for the decision is established.

tasks.description: Communicate the decision to the reporter in a respectful and constructive way, perhaps suggesting an alternative angle.
tasks.expected_outcome: The reporter understands the decision and receives constructive feedback.
